results.definition: the dead body of a human being
examples: honor comes to bless the turf that wraps their clay

results.definition: United States politician responsible for the Missouri Compromise between free and slave states (1777-1852)
United States general who commanded United States forces in Europe from 1945 to 1949 and who oversaw the Berlin airlift (1897-1978)
water soaked soil; soft wet earth
a very fine-grained soil that is plastic when moist but hard when fired
